question: Which saint established a monastery and Christian community on the island of Lindisfarne in the year 635 ?
chain_of_thought_result: The saint who established a monastery and Christian community on the island of Lindisfarne in the year 635 is Saint Aidan. He was sent from Iona, Scotland, to evangelize the Anglo-Saxons and played a significant role in the spread of Christianity in Northumbria.
